use_custom_domain.title: Use your custom domain
use_custom_domain.description: If you have a custom subdomain you can enable it here

custom_domain.title: Custom domain
custom_domain.description: Fill in your custom domain here (without https://)

record_dnt.title: Record DNT users
record_dnt.description: Record page views also when DNT is enabled. DNT is to prevent tracking but we never do. So you can enable it.

hash_mode.title: Website uses hash navigation
hash_mode.description: Check this box when you website uses hashtags (#) for navigation (for example carrd.co websites). If you don't know what this means, leave the box unchecked.
